ValidationRule.description: If Pass to New Biz then HRIS Status, Onboarding QC, Employee Load Complete and Medical Completed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.DeveloperName="PEO_New_Client_Onboarding", Pass_to_New_Loads__c = TRUE, OR( ISBLANK(Employee_Load_Complete__c), ISBLANK( Final_Medical_Approval_Milestone__c), ISBLANK( Onboarding_QC__c), NOT ISPICKVAL(Current_Onboarding_HRIS_Status__c,"Approved")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If pass to new biz is checked then you need On-boarding HRIS Status= Approved, Employee load complete, final medical approval-milestone, On boarding QC all populated
